title: PICS: Khanyi Mbau's surprise 34th birthday party
text:
PICS: Khanyi Mbau's surprise 34th birthday party share this

Khanyi Mbau recently celebrated turning 34 by penning a heartfelt letter to her body and to make her day extra special, her friends threw her a surprise birthday soiree at the Castle Kyalami hotel in Johannesburg on Tuesday.

Read more: Khanyi Mbau just did the DMX challenge – and her transformation is incredible

The white with a touch of gold themed party was attended by Khanyi’s close friends as well as some of her famous friends including her brother Lasizwe, Cassper Nyovest, Shashi Naidoo, Keke Mphuthi and everyone’s favorite dentist, Dr Lex.

The attendees took to Instagram to post pictures from the event under the hashtag #Mbau34 and #KhanyisSurpriseBirthdaySoiree.

See pictures from the surprise birthday here:
description: The white with a touch of gold themed party was attended by Khanyi’s close friends as well as some of her famous friends.
